projects.title: DataLagbe
projects.bodyText:
- A data marketplace is an online transactional location or store that facilitates the buying and selling of data.
 - Store dataset in **aws s3** buckets.
 - Dataset open using **google colab**.
 - Write API documentation using postman.

projects.title: Node.JS Template (Nano App)
projects.bodyText:
- Creating a node.js application structure using a single line command.
 - **ES6+** configuration (Babel).
 - **Google** authentication (Passport strategy).
 - Email authentication with **OTP** verification (Sent mail using Google Gmail).
 - Implement **MFA** using speakeasy.
 - Modern data validation using **Joi**.

projects.title: DebitCredit
projects.bodyText:
- A secure and easy way to **track** your **expenses** and **income**.
 - Create **expenses** / **income** category.
 - Create **payment** category.
 - Create monthly **budget** category wise.
 - Debt & owed tracking.
 - Export data / **google drive** backup.
 - Send data via email.
 - **Currency** setup.

projects.title: Online Doctor Chamber (ODC)
projects.bodyText:
- A project for International Centre for Diarrhoeal Disease Research, Bangladesh (ICDDR, B).
 - Doctor create slots.
 - Patient can easily take appointment.
 - Patient need to pay doctor fee using backgladeshi mobile financial service (bKash).
 - Doctor can write prescriptions.

projects.title: Twitter bot
projects.bodyText:
- Retweet and like your tweet.
 - 3 types hashtags retweet like #nodejs, #javascript, #100DaysOfCode.

projects.title: Inventory System
projects.bodyText:
- A secured solution to tracking inventory levels, orders, deliveries.
 - Order wise **QR** code generation.
 - **Online** & offline sales.
 - Manage inventory **accounts**.
 - Easy export **reports**.

projects.title: Bd COVID-19 Map
projects.bodyText:
- Visual of our country of number of COVID-19 patients in every district.
 - Anyone can get overall visual of our country's present status of COVID-19.

projects.title: Git Helper
projects.bodyText: - This project help for the developer to learn about git or Github Commands.
